articles.description: The actress has been a vegan since March.
articles.content:
I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here! star Beverley Callard unequivocally ate no meat in camp this year.

articles.title: Hugh Grant says he felt ‘depressed’ reading tweets about The Undoing - The Independent
articles.description: ‘Quite a few people on Twitter said, “Hugh Grant can’t cry.” Well, I was crying,' Grant commented
articles.content:
Hugh Grant says that reading audience reactions to The Undoing on Twitter was an exhausting and depressing experience.

articles.content:

articles.title: The Undoing: Donald Sutherland's sprawling NYC apartment in the show is mix of two homes - Daily Mail
articles.description: 1215 Fifth Avenue serves as the exterior home for Sutherland's character Franklin Reinhart. The interior shots were taken at 1107 Fifth and a specially built set in Queens.
articles.content:
Donald Sutherland's sprawling New York City apartment in The Undoing is a mix of two multi-million dollar Central Park-facing homes and a specially built set in Queens.
